For half a semester this year my school removed the cocacola machines and replaced them with disgusting fruit drinks. The goal was to give healthier food while gaining money. It didnt work at all they lost money then removed the drinks. I think it was an excellent plan except it was the most disgusting thing to go down my throat hole
The same exact thing happened with us. Only they have had the healthy machines there for around a year now. They aren't going to take them away dispite the fact that they are losing money.
My school too. My advice? If you don't like the food bring your own!

Actually, it makes no sense the way they do it for us. They will sell greasy pizza with fries and cheesburgers, all very unhealthy. As long as it's not in a vending machine it can be as unhealthy as they want. But they can't sell a bag of chips in vending machines. They'll sell you a greasy hamburger, pizza, fries, etc. but not a bag of chips.
 
 Now I never bought food from the school anyway. The burgers and pizza looks pretty disgusting and the vending machine foods were always so expensive.
 
 But now that they've only put healthy foods in the vending machines they aren't making as much money, and they wonder why.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  mmm fruit flavored
